name: possibleTags(at:scheme:tokenRange:sentenceRange:scores:)
desc: Returns an array of possible tags for the given scheme at the specified range, supplying matching scores.
declaration:
func possibleTags(at charIndex: Int, 
           scheme tagScheme: String, 
       tokenRange: NSRangePointer?, 
    sentenceRange: NSRangePointer?, 
           scores: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSArray?>?) -> [String]?
